> 5 hours ago, winged said:
> 
> 
> I've made 200 day spiral burn within just 20 minutes.
> 

What mod do you use for thrusting in timewarp?
Anyone have success with this mod and 1.6?

>

> 8 hours ago, Psycho\_zs said:
> 
> 
> What mod do you use for thrusting in timewarp? ﻿
> 

Persistent Thrust.

>

> 
> 
> Persistent Thrust.
> 

Oh, it's alive! That is a pleasant surprise.
Has anyone tried in 1.6?
